entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Wind becoming north 30 km/h after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light late in the morning. High 15. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 2 May 2023
